title_formats.example: Build Your First Product in 30 Days: The Biblical Man Method

title_formats.pattern: How I [Achieved Result] (And You Can Too)
title_formats.example: How I Built a $10K/Month Ministry (And You Can Too)

pricing_psychology.reasoning: Odd numbers + just below psychological barriers

page_count.reasoning: Too short = low perceived value. Too long = won't finish.

hooks_that_convert: Most [audience] waste [timeframe] on [problem]. Here's the shortcut.
I made every mistake so you don't have to. Here's what worked.
[Number] [audience members] asked me this. Here's the system I gave them.
This [method] took me from [before] to [after] in [timeframe].

sales_page_patterns.bullet_structure: Get [specific benefit] - [why it matters] - [how it helps]
sales_page_patterns.guarantee: 90-day money back - if you don't [specific result], full refund
sales_page_patterns.urgency: Real only - limited spots, price increase, bonus expiring

product_ideas: Decision-Making System for Christian Men (Template pack)
The Christian Marriage Repair Kit (Action guide)
Bible Study System for Busy Men

prompt_structure.section_1_context: Set the tone, audience, and outcome
prompt_structure.section_2_research: Request specific data, case studies, biblical references
prompt_structure.section_5_deliverable: PDF specs, design notes, file requirements

quality_requirements: Zero fluff - every page must provide value
Action-oriented - tell them exactly what to do
Masculine tone - direct, confrontational when needed
Visual hierarchy - clear headings, bullets, white space
Scannable - can extract value in 10 minutes
